Below is an incomplete collection of blog posts and things/groups I appreciate and respect. The order of this list is randomized because it is arbituary. Also, this collection probably describes more about my own interest than anything else.


Podcasts:
  • Conversations with Tyler by Tyler Cowen
  • The Knowledge Project by Shane Parrish
  • Recode Decode by Kara Swisher
  • Indie Hackers by Courtland Allen
  • Talking Practice by Grace La
  • Product Hunt Radio by Ryan Hoover & Abadesi Osunsade
  • The Human Code by Laurie Segall
  • IRL by Manoush Zomorodi
  • Ologies by Alie Ward


Groups:
  • Dubberly Design Office
  • Dynamicland
  • New Computer Working Group
  • Soft Surplus
  • Skrekkøgle
  • The Screenless Office
  • Frolic Studio
  • BERG
  • Nord Projects
  • Indie VC
  • Special Projects
  • Plethora Project
  • Otherlab


Books:
  • The Dream Machine by M. Mitchell Waldrop
  • Architectural Intelligence by Molly Wright Steenson
  • Reinventing Fire by Amory B. Lovins
  • How Buildings Learn by Stewart Brand
  • The Timeles Way of Building by Christopher Alexander


Articles:
  • The Coming Software Apocalypse by James Somers
  • What Can a Technologist Do About Climate Change by Bret Victor
  • The Independent Research by Nadia Eghbal
  • Technical Conversations by Nadia Eghbal
  • Indie Magonomics – making a sustainable indie print magazine by Kai Brach
  • AI & Culture: Buildings, Cities (and Infrastructures, and Beyond…) by Molly Wright Steenson
  • Reflecting on My Failure to Build a Billion-Dollar Company by Sahil Lavingia
